relationships.description: Planning to meet socially while in Megeve
Claims government officials are seeking his explanation/insights about Trump

analysis.summary: Jeffrey Epstein emails Ariane de Rothschild to coordinate a meeting in Megeve while boasting that 'everyone in govt' is seeking his explanation about Trump, which he describes as 'SO MUCH FUN'.
